Why do you like those key chains?
They come in so many different colors.
Some of them are pink. Others are green. And the others are blue.
My mom bought me these three caps.
One is white. Another is red. And the other is green.
Wow. Where did she buy them? I also need to buy one.
Shall I give you one of them? Which one do you prefer?
Oh, thanks. This is what I want.
